price: ߞߏ߫ ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߣߴߊ߲ ߛߊ߬ ߘߊ߫ ߞߵߊ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߓߎ߰ߘߌ ߟߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߞߟߏ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߒ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߟߊߥߟߌ߬ ߕߎ߲߯؟
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban waʿiẓāman a-innā lamabʿūthūna
